title: MEMORY REQUEST Capsule
description: Declarative request to access a specific externalized memory by symbolic identifier.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the memory request.

hash.description: Deterministic hash of the canonicalized capsule. Computed externally.

memory_id.description: Opaque, symbolic identifier of the requested memory.

intent.description: Human-readable reason for requesting the memory.

memory_domain.description: Optional classification of the memory domain (e.g. relational, episodic, policy).

requested_projection.description: Optional hint describing how the memory might be projected if retrieved.

consent_reference.description: Optional capsule_id of a CONSENT ASSERTION relevant to this request.

notes.description: Optional human-readable notes clarifying request context.
